General.Name: Doral Group Renewable Energy Resources Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Doral Group Renewable Energy Resources Ltd operates renewable energy, solar energy, and energy storage plants facilities in Israel. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
